description:
The moon is going to crash into the Earth, and there is no way to stop it.  Fine`s plan has been to raise the floating continent of Frontier in order to survive, but they lack the needed technology.  They attempt to make a deal with the American government, which betrays them instead.  Ver`s noise intervene to save them, but Hibiki is nearby, and she`s forced to transform to survive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hand in Hand for Me, as I Waver...
Tsunagu Te to Te... Tomadou Watashi no Tame...
繋ぐ手と手... 戸惑うわたしのため...
